item.title: Install CLI Tools Ubuntu 18.04
item.description: Install basic development CLI tools in Ubuntu 18.04. It includes: oh-my-zsh idle venv git tree Install Git in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS Install Git: sudo apt install git Add global configuration for Git user: git config --global user.email "you@example.com" git config --global user.name "Your Name" Add SSH. Details can be found in this gist Install Oh My Zsh in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS Install Zsh:
